verbs.description: Maggie Haberman , [ARG1: the New York Times reporter] [R-ARG1: who] [V: was] [ARG2: the subject of President Donald Trump 's intense Twitter barbs this weekend] , appeared on CNN 's New Day to respond Monday morning .
